direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods compare OpenAPI documents but handle different input types (files vs. content strings).
Both methods handle file locations and involve similar control flows for parsing and comparing OpenAPI documents.
Both methods perform comparisons on OpenAPI specifications, making test cases for one method applicable to the other.
Both methods involve reading OpenAPI specifications from locations, with similar exception handling and resource access patterns.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of the OpenAPIParser for parsing OpenAPI documents.
Reading the location of the OpenAPI documents is a prerequisite for comparison, similar to how fromFiles reads files.
Both methods verify the format of OpenAPI documents and handle similar exceptions, making it useful for assertions.
